title: At the winter sea ice camp. Pt. 3
creator_credit: Quentin Brown, Kevin Smith, Education Development Center and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Part of a series on the Netsilik Inuit as documented by the Education Center. In this part, work begins on a spacious community igloo. When the men return to their hunt, the women continue with their work and play games with the children. A seal is dragged into the igloo to be shared by everyone including the dogs, who are called in to clean up. (Award: Parno)
